course.subject: LANG
course.name: Chinese Communication in the Digital Era
course.description: This course targets all students who have a background in Chinese, and with a strong interest in the use of Chinese in digital media. The focus of this course is to  lead  students to explore the characteristics of using Chinese in digital media for social, professional and academic communication purposes, and to develop their Putonghua speaking and Standard Chinese writing abilities through digital media platforms. The emphasis is on using Chinese to talk about digital media. Students  can also have a deeper understanding of the current situation and developmental  direction of Chinese digital media in the digital age, and be able to discuss topics in this field in Chinese.
course.exclusions: LANG 1411, LANG 1412, LANG 1413, LANG 1414, LANG 1415, LANG 1120 (prior to 2022-23), LANG 1121 (prior to 2022-23), LANG 1122 (prior to 2022-23), LANG 1123 (prior to 2022-23), LANG 1124 (prior to 2022-23), LANG 1125 (prior to 2022-23), LANG 1126 (prior to 2022-23), LANG 1127 (prior to 2022-23)

reviews.author: 冷清月
reviews.title: Eddy FUNG saved my life!
reviews.comment_content:
普通话教学，老师的普通话说的特别好，没有广东话口音。
上课偶尔听一耳朵，不是每句话都听了的。
还是去canvas找了一下目录：
第一單元 新媒體的多元性、靈活性與吸引力
第二單元 數字時代的生活態度與方法
第三單元 創新为本的社交連接
不听的话其实也没太有所谓，因为最后考试是写文章，把自己的感悟写出来就行。
reviews.comment_teaching:
老师非常温和儒雅，不过上课提问的时候没有什么人搭理他就是了，我有时会回答他。
教的就比较按照教学大纲。
老师脾气挺不错的，情绪稳定。
reviews.comment_grading:
我在科大第一个A。
我写作文水平还是不错的，因为同班我认识的人基本上是local，他们的最后作文我有看过，我觉得我的水平还是超出一些。
不过lang课的给龟嘛，大家还是抱着比较容易烂的心理吧，我感觉总体来说不会特别好。
reviews.comment_workload:
有六个评估。有attendance。
評估一 第一單元學習反思視頻
評估二 網絡公開演説
評估三 博客文章
評估四 小組網絡直播
評估五 社交媒體文章
評估六 學期學習反思文
就是视频一个+zoom演讲一个+作文一篇+直播小组作业一个+facebook文章一篇+期末随堂作文一篇。
直播作业因为是小组作业，工作量会比较大，其他的就是正常的写作文。演讲需要自己练习一下演讲。

reviews.author: New fruit
reviews.title: Worst course I have ever seen in both grading and content
reviews.comment_content:
Mostly unrelated to the course outcome

One personal talk on ZOOM 20%
One group discussion on ZOOM 20%
Three essays:
One argumentative essay 20%
One descriptive essay 20%
One reflection essay 10%
Peer review and class performance 10%
reviews.comment_teaching:
The instructor tries to enhance class atmosphere by doing discussions often, making jokes. But she does not convey assessment criteria clearly and explicitly. During discussions, low quality essays were used and she agrees with every point the students make, while for the actual assignments she has her own expectations.

Assignment submission methods are very tedious and troublesome. As a result, she spent a long time to explain so, which is a waste of lesson time.
reviews.comment_grading:
Super harsh

You get middle/ middle high grades for all assignments, but then you will end up with a C+ / C.

Assignment criteria was not clearly set before the submission, and you were informed of not fulfilling this and that after you get the result. Then a new set of criteria comes for the next assignments.  

Terrible workload with bad grades as well!
reviews.comment_workload:
Huge workload.

(1) During post COVID years, putting presentations on ZOOM which is prone to internet problems is ridiculous, even if this is a course in digital media.
(2) Group project is about doing an ACTUAL charity service, and then promoting the activity in ZOOM as a group. The whole thing is deviated from the course outcomes and makes people stressed when they couldn't hold a charity event due to problems in finding organizers, participants or materials.

(3) Reflection essay is meaningless as whether the instructor agress with what you said you have learnt is subjective.
